General.Name: Catcha Digital Bhd
General.Description: Catcha Digital Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in digital media business. The company provides technology and social influencer marketing; content production; digital advertising; publication; video streaming. It provides solutions to FMCG, retail, property, entertainment, and other industries in Malaysia. Catcha Digital Berhad was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia. Catcha Digital Berhad is a subsidiary of Catcha Group Pte. Ltd.
